Requires leveling up the branch to %1$s %2$s for use.
Select toggle mode: 'Purchase' to acquire the skill.
Select toggle mode: 'Upgrade' to improve the skill.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.gui.help: To obtain SkillPoints, you need SkillXp, which can be acquired by mining ores or gaining experience from Relics. Additionally, skill experience can be gained by killing mobs. The skill experience bar at the bottom indicates how much SkillXp is left to collect until the next SkillPoint.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_1: With a 3% chance for each mined block using a pickaxe, allows obtaining an additional random unprocessed ore.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_2: Allows mining blocks in a 3x1 radius using a pickaxe.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_3: With a 2% chance for each mined block using a pickaxe, can regenerate 1 heart.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_4: Attracts all dropped resources to the player immediately when using a pickaxe.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_5: Increases the chance of dropping valuable ores when using a pickaxe.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_6: With a 2% chance for each skill level when using a shovel, grants a short-term speed effect.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_7: With a 0.4% chance for each mined block using a shovel, obtain a random item from a treasure chest.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_9: When using a pickaxe in the off-hand, accelerates block mining with a 15% chance.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_1: With a 10% chance, applies invisibility when mining blocks with a pickaxe.
Expands the capabilities of the pickaxe, allowing the mining of blocks in a 3x3 radius.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_1: With a 0.5% chance, ignites the enemy upon a successful attack.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_2: Allows shooting from a bow and crossbow without the need for arrows.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_3: Upon a successful attack, increases damage and stuns enemies for a certain duration.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_4: With a 1% chance per level, creates an explosion dealing damage to the surrounding area.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_5: With a 0.5% chance per level, creates magical stones around the player upon a successful attack, dealing damage to surrounding enemies.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_6: With a 0.4% chance, 1 Soul is dropped from a killed creature.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_7: With a 2% chance per level, allows attacking nearby enemies upon a strike.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_8: With a 10% chance per level, restores half a heart to the player upon an attack.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_9: Increases the chance to deal critical damage upon a successful attack.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_1: Allows the player to instantly dash towards an enemy in the direction of the crosshair when [Right Mouse Button] is pressed.
Allows the player to temporarily increase defense, reducing incoming damage.
tooltip.relics.fate_beacon.description: The relic in the owner's hand points to the nearest water structures and allows teleporting to a mark set by the owner.
tooltip.relics.fate_beacon.ability.compa: Creates a pointer whose color depends on the structure it points to. Depending on the color, it points to §6hidden treasure, §3shipwreck, §1underwater temple§r and §5underwater ruins.
tooltip.relics.fate_beacon.ability.set_b: Sets a teleportation point for the 'Instant Return' ability. Only works in the overworld.
tooltip.relics.fate_beacon.ability.insta: Allows the relic owner to teleport to the set teleportation point from the 'Beacon Mark' ability once every %1$s minutes.
tooltip.relics.fate_beacon.leveling_sour: +1 experience point for every 50 blocks of distance from the teleportation point to the 'Beacon Mark'
tooltip.relics.shadow_lantern.descriptio: Grants the relic owner the ability to control the night and quickly move through dark areas of the world.
tooltip.relics.shadow_lantern.ability.du: Grants the wearer complete invisibility and increases their movement speed by %3$s% for %2$s seconds when light level is %1$s or lower.
tooltip.relics.shadow_lantern.ability.li: Turns the darkness around you into blinding light, highlighting all hostile mobs within a %1$s block radius.
tooltip.relics.shadow_lantern.ability.ti: Allows changing the time of day to night instantly once every %1$s minutes.
tooltip.relics.shadow_lantern.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each activation of %2$s ability.
+%1$s experience points for each activation of %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.stellar_sphere.descriptio: The relic grants the power of stars, which heals the owner during the night and repels enemies from them, as well as allows dealing area damage to enemies by launching them and summoning a hail of stars upon them.
tooltip.relics.stellar_sphere.ability.st: Creates an area of stars that regenerates the relic owner's health and deals %2$s damage to enemies within a %1$s block radius.
Launches nearby enemies within a %1$s block radius into the air.
Summons a rain of sparkling stars that deals %3$s damage to enemies within a %1$s block radius and lasts for %2$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.stellar_sphere.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each activation of %2$s ability.
+%1$s experience points for each activation of %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.icy_crystal.description: The relic user unlocks the potential of snow and ice, allowing them to launch ice projectiles, unleash waves of snow upon enemies, and freeze them.
tooltip.relics.icy_crystal.ability.snowy: Creates an avalanche of snow around you, dealing %1$s damage to enemies within a %2$s block radius and knocking them back.
tooltip.relics.icy_crystal.ability.frost: Freezes enemies within a %2$s block radius for %1$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.icy_crystal.ability.icy_p: Fires an ice projectile of size %1$s, dealing %2$s damage to the enemy. Cooldown - %3$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.icy_crystal.leveling_sour: +%1$s experience points for each activation of %2$s ability.
+%1$s experience points for each activation of %2$s ability.
+%1$s experience points for each activation of %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.weightless_boot.descripti: Users of this relic can safely fall from great heights and deal fall damage while ignoring part of the damage and receiving healing.
tooltip.relics.weightless_boot.ability.l: Softens falls, reducing damage taken to %1$s%, and restores %2$s health upon falling.
tooltip.relics.weightless_boot.ability.p: When activated, turns falling into a smooth descent. Cooldown time - %1$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.weightless_boot.ability.a: Upon landing, creates an airstrike that deals %2$s damage to nearby entities within a %1$s block radius.
tooltip.relics.weightless_boot.leveling_: +%1$s experience points for each activation of %2$s ability.
+1 experience point for each entity killed by %2$s ability.
